name: White Bean Spread With Garlic & Rosemary
author: USA WEEKEND columnist Pam Anderson
summary: This spread has a long shelf life - it can be refrigerated for up to 2 weeks -  and can be pulled out for impromptu entertaining.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, plus extra for drizzling
directions: Place olive oil, garlic and rosemary in a 10-inch skillet
Heat pan until ingredients start to sizzle
Add beans and their liquid to the pan
As beans cook, mash them with a wooden spoon or potato masher
Cook until mixture is a loose spread consistency (it will thicken as it cools)
Transfer to a serving bowl or storage container
